channel.title: [508 + 659] RuneScape DemonWars - Revealed with new info about the storyline
channel.description:
Greetings I am DemonWars.
Today i am releaving the RSDW v3.
These will have: [508] 1: all of the features of the v2 2: Updated HP shown 3: more NPC dialogue 4: more NPC transformations 5: more Magic curses 6: A better storyline 7: more customs 8: a blank RSDW source for starters 9: new home ofcourse 10: more NPCs
The V3 will be released in 3 parts: (they will all have the same things but will have other storyline) 1: The Coming Darkness [ This will explain how the Demon invasion started and make u get special stuff to help you in the other parts ]
2: Grim Tales [ now you will be inside the invasion and you will have to fight yourself through the demons that are aggressive and will be spawned to kill you ]
3: SECRET!!! [ this will be revealed when the release is 1 week away ]
[ READ! ]
The v3 will not be the end of the story, i am going to stretch the story as long as you want me to.
[659] {keep in mind that this will be the V1 of the 659 series} 1: all the original stuff of the MezzyScape562 base (i have permission!) 2: as much as possible features of RSDW 508 (more will be revealed when i have more then 2 things to add)
Storyline: V1: Scars from the past [ although Varrock and camelot have bin oblitirated by the wars between the gods and demons, Death has not givin up yet. with the Savior of Varrock gone he used the last 150 years to gather a even greater army. you need to gather your friends in order to stop him, while further in the story you will need to betray them to get the "Amulet of DemonWars", this amulet will give you the power of Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, saradomin and even Death himself. ]
This will be released when i am done, i will try to not make it 8 months again, but then again, those 8 months gave me Great results right?
At the end of the second DemonWars era, you will be either MOD (Master of Death) or Divine Skull-Lord, depending on what side you choose.
[ Q&A ]
Q: Why the second DemonWars era? A: the last era is what created the wilderness, it was solved by The DemonLord (DemonWars's Grandfather)
Q: Wait DemonWars is a person? A: ofcourse, You play DemonWars in the v1,v2 and even v3
Q: Why did the so called "The DemonLord" call the era The DemonWars era? A: he didn't, King Lathas did, (king roald's Grandfather)
Q: Can you please explain the history of RSDW? A: sure here:
Year: 145 Location: Varrock Castle
Story: 5 guards with their general run through the gate, general: Ur highnes! King lathas: stand still general whats the problem? general: we just came back from the Holy forest! king lathas: whats wrong there? general: its gone! King Lathas: WHAT?? general: sire, it has bin reduced to ashes! King Lathas: is this a joke soldier? general: No sire, there are demons everywhere!! King lathas: By saradomin, what can we do now? general: we came to get you. King Lathas: i will go nowhere! if these demons will attack i must be here to protect the people of varrock. general: but sire, the demons are only 40ft north of your castle, the towns people cant live without a king! King Lathas: and a kingdom cannot exist without a king, i stay here. general: as you wish sire, rookie! rookie soldier: yes sir? general: go get 9 other guards and defend the castle. Rookie soldier: yes sir. general: commander, commander: yes sir? general: get 2 other guards and go warn camelot and falador. commander: yes sir.
King lathas: general? general: yes sire? King Lathas: bring me to the dungeons. general: i dont understand sire, why? King lathas: those mages of the library captured that criminal right? general: yes sire, but how is this relevant to the Demon crisis? King lathas: i need to ask him for a favor. General: but sire, he is the most dangerous criminal we have ever seen. King Lathas: he almost killed 32 guardsmen with no weapon. general: but sire, how do we know he is not going to kill you when he gets out? King lathas: the reason he killed all those gaurds was only to warn me that this would happen. general: how do you know that sire? King lathas: he told me in the dungeons 2 weeks ago. general: why didn't you say anything sire? King lathas: becouse i thought he was mad, now i know he was telling the truth. general: but how do yo think he is going to help? king lathas: i dont know yet, but he may be helpfull.
Location: varrock castle dungeons
story:
King lathas: thank you general, you may leave now. general: but sire, what if he tries to attack you? King lathas: didn't i just gave you an order general? general: yes sir, be carefull. King lathas: i will.
Location: Varrock Castle Dungeons (cell 16)
Story: UNKNOWN: hello lucien. King lathas: how did you know my name? UNKNOWN: i know a great many things, i can also see that demons attacked the holy forest. King Lathas: how did you know? UNKNOWN: thats not important right now. King Lathas: i agree, i came to ask you for a favor. UNKNOWN: ah, you want to ask me if i could stop the invasion. King Lathas: how... UNKNOWN: i will help you, but i will need my equipment. King Lathas: uhm yes about that... UNKNOWN: don't tell me you have lost it? King Lathas: you already knew didn't you? UNKNOWN: yes, but in order to help, i need it. King Lathas: ofcourse, i will send you a squad of guards to escort you to the cave. UNKNOWN: we both know i dont need a escort, but as you wish sire. King Lathas: thank you.
Location: Dwarven mines
Story: general: do you have any idea where you are going? UNKNOWN: ofcourse i do, right here. general: how do you know? UNKNOWN: i have ancient powers that have passed through family members for ages. general: what kind of powers? UNKNOWN: when we are better friends ask me again. general: hhmpf! UNKNOWN: alright we are here. general: why are we looking at a wall? UNKNOWN: ash as blood, horns as heads, my sword will strike through iron, my fire will turn all to ash, my arrows will pierce through rune, Demons will die! general: huh? *Wall shifts and shows amulets, swords, staffs, bows, arrows, strange runes and wierd looking armor and robes* UNKNOWN: thats better. general: what just happened? UNKNOWN: this is what my ancestors left me, equipment what may only be weared by a "Demon Blood" general: demon blood? are you a Demon???? UNKNOWN: no, i posses their powers general: i dont think i am ever going to understand. UNKNOWN: i dont think so either, but i shall now teleport to the holy forest general: wait a second, thats suicide! UNKNOWN: for a ordinary mortal yes. general: huh? UNKNOWN: never mind. general: well best of luck i gues... UNKNOWN: thank you, tell lucien the war is over. general: the war is ove... wait how did you know the emperor's name? *he slowly fades away*
Location: the holy forest, or alteast whats left of it.
UNKNOWN: by saradomin! *there are ghosts and demons everywhere* UNKNOWN: hey! ghost: whooo! UNKNOWN: what happened here? ghost: there was a robed creature like 14ft tall with no face here, he just spawned over 500 demons and dragons. UNKNOWN: then what happend? ghost: the dragons started to burn everything while the demons killed everyone UNKNOWN: well dont worry, i will salvage the situation ghost: maybe i can help, he called himself "The Grim Reaper" UNKNOWN: hmm, why would he do something like this? ghost: i have no idea, but this place is done for, go talk to him. UNKNOWN: i will be there the next time, I PROMISE! ghost: who are you? UNKNOWN: they gave me many names, i prefer no name. ghost: then how do i know its you who saves us the next time? UNKNOWN: it will be my grandson then, he will he wearing a red glowing ring. ghost: thank you. UNKNOWN: no problem, i am off to face death. ghost: farethee well,
Location: office of Death
Story: Death: you are not supossed to be here! UNKNOWN: why did you sent those demons to destroy the holy forest? Death: why? becouse i can, i am sick of serving gods, i will rule RuneScape forever! UNKNOWN: why? dont you have your own empire? Death: yes, but its realy empty UNKNOWN: i want to make a deal with you. UNKNOWN: my son will serve you during your next attack if you call of this one. Death: you are willing to give one of your bloodshared to me to call of the war? UNKNOWN: yes, but i will have 2 sons, one is for you and one will try to stop you Death: hmm, i do like a litle family drama in a war... Death: agreed, i will now call of my demons and sent them back to my dimension. UNKNOWN: thank you. Death: no sir, thank you.
Location: Varrock castle
Story: general: i dont know what happend sire, they just vanished... king lathas: well there must be an explaination for all this... general: wait sire, you dont think that... king lathas: maybe, i mean i have not seen him since... (he walks through the gate) general: oh my god... king lathas: i knew you would return. UNKNOWN: i said i would end this all. general: looks like i miss judged you sir knight, i am sorry. king lathas: sir knight huh? u need a better name. King lathas: general? general: yes sire? king lathas: get the whole town together for a meeting near the castle garden. general: yes sir.
(time passes by and we get to the garden) general: enjoy, you diserve it. king lathas: indeed you do. King lathas: (yell) behold the savior of Varrock and perhaps all of runescape. King lathas: we are in your debt, DemonLord. towns people: ALL HAIL DEMONLORD!!! general: demonlord huh? general: suits you well. king lathas: you are once again free to walk the earth, you are always welcome in my castle. king lathas: now lets enjoy the party!
several hours later i wander off home, years later i got kids, they got kids and so the next era approaches. lets hope they are ready for it.
now this story shoudl be longer, but i decided to make it shorter.
hope i have givin u guys enough info, if u have any more questions please ask.
Greetz DemonWars

y arent u working on it anymore

No working on it doesn’t mean he left the project, I know that guy really good, He won’t quit since he loves to code.

Indeed i do, but since my best resources and skills are in 508 i decided to stay with that revission.
I just dont keep updating the site cuz i want u guys to b duprised when it comes out and alot of friends i go to almost everyday.

Greetz DemonWars
[/quote]

That was expected ^^, it’s hard to move from a coding environment to other.[/quote]

not that hard, just seems better to stay with one revission, u get better results

item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

Yha sorry, but here is a list of what i need to do:
1: code the dialogue of the npc talk
2: add gfx and anims when teleporting
3: add the sounds when in battle
4: add all the npcs what are needed for the scene
5: need to add the battle dialogue
6: then i need to film it
7: then i need to make a movie outa it
The last 6 minutes video took me like 3 days to make, so i will try to make this one as fast as possible

Read full topic
